original_text:
“‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says:
“‘I will put an end to the hordes of Egypt
    by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 내가 또 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕의 손으로 애굽의 무리들을 끊으리니

sentences.original_text: This is what the Sovereign Lord says:
I will put an end to the hordes of Egypt
by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon.
